Uses of Package
bcid

Packages that use bcid
bcid The BCID package contains the core components of the BCID system, including minting, creation, and working with elements and groups in the BCID system 
bcid.Renderer   
 

Classes in bcid used by bcid
bcid
          The bcid class encapsulates all of the information we know about a BCID.
BCIDMetadataSchema.metadataElement
          A convenience class for holding metadata elements
database
          Creates the connection for the backend bcid database.
dataGroupEncoder
          The purpsose of the datasetEncoder is to encode very short identifiers for EZID shoulders to represent unique datasets.
dataGroupMinter
          This class mints shoulders for use in the EZID systems known as data groups.
elementMinter
          The elementMinter class brokers interactions between elements and groups and a mysql backend database.
encoder
          Encoders interface defines the methods and fields that the various encoders need to implement
GenericIdentifier
          The Identifier class encapsulates all types of identifiers that we deal with in the BCID system
GenericIdentifierInterface
          All identifiers need to have a getMetadata function
ResourceType
          Components used to describe individual resource types.
 

Classes in bcid used by bcid.Renderer
BCIDMetadataSchema
          Metadata Schema for Describing an identifier -- These are the metadata elements building blocks that we can use to express this identifier either via RDF or HTML and consequently forms the basis of what the "outside" world sees about the identifiers.
GenericIdentifier
          The Identifier class encapsulates all types of identifiers that we deal with in the BCID system
